name: Poseidon
body:
### Welcome to Poseidon.

Poseidon is a open source solution for a chiropractic clinic. 

###Feature

* Registry and manage patients.
* registry and manage appointments.

### Propose for Building
Our team believe that building good and free software we can change the world. If each person take a small step to transform our world into a better place to live one day the whole planet will be better, and that's why we build free software for our community.

### Authors and Contributors
Our team is built by peoples who enjoy programming in the weekend, after working time and for fun. The team is: @willmenn, @matuella, @jaderTS, @pedrro and @luturol.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
